def_en: If something is well suited to a particular purpose, it is right or appropriate for that purpose. If someone is well suited to a particular job, they are right or appropriate for that job.

def_cn: (尤指情侣)般配的，志同道合的
def_en: If two people, especially a man and a woman, are well suited, they are likely to have a successful relationship because they have similar personalities or interests.
